 1679: 
 1680: wait_for_whole_response() ->
 1681:     [{doc, "Check OTP-8154"}].
 1682: wait_for_whole_response(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1683: 
 1684:      ReqSeqNumServer = start_sequence_number_server(),
 1685:      RespSeqNumServer = start_sequence_number_server(),
 1686:      {ok, Server, Port} = start_slow_server(RespSeqNumServer),
 1687:      Clients = run_clients(105, Port, ReqSeqNumServer),
 1688:      ok = wait4clients(Clients, timer:minutes(3)),
 1689:      Server ! shutdown,
 1690:      RespSeqNumServer ! shutdown,
 1691:      ReqSeqNumServer ! shutdown.
 1692: 
 1693: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1694: post_204_chunked() ->
 1695:     [{doc,"Test that chunked encoded 204 responses do not freeze the http client"}].
 1696: post_204_chunked(_Config) ->
 1697:     Msg = "HTTP/1.1 204 No Content\r\n" ++
 1698:         "Date: Thu, 23 Aug 2018 13:36:29 GMT\r\n" ++
 1699:         "Content-Type: text/html\r\n" ++
 1700:         "Server: inets/6.5.2.3\r\n" ++
 1701:         "Cache-Control: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1702:         "Pragma: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1703:         "Expires: Fri, 24 Aug 2018 07:49:35 GMT\r\n" ++
 1704:         "Transfer-Encoding: chunked\r\n" ++
 1705:         "\r\n",
 1706:     Chunk = "0\r\n\r\n",
 1707: 
 1708:     {ok, ListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active,once}, binary]),
 1709:     {ok,{_,Port}} = inet:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1710:     spawn(fun () -> custom_server(Msg, Chunk, ListenSocket,
 1711:                                   fun custom_receive/0) end),
 1712: 
 1713:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1714:     End = "/cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:post_204",
 1715:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End,
 1716:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(post, {URL, [], "text/html", []}, [], []),
 1717:     timer:sleep(500),
 1718:     %% Second request times out in the faulty case.
 1719:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(post, {URL, [], "text/html", []}, [], []).
 1720: 
 1721: custom_receive() ->
 1722:     receive
 1723:         {tcp, _, Msg} ->
 1724:             ct:log("Message received: ~p", [Msg])
 1725:     after
 1726:         1000 ->
 1727:             ct:fail("Timeout: did not receive packet")
 1728:     end.
 1729: 
 1730: %% Custom server is used to test special cases when using chunked encoding
 1731: custom_server(Msg, Chunk, ListenSocket, ReceiveFun) ->
 1732:     {ok, Accept} = gen_tcp:accept(ListenSocket),
 1733:     ReceiveFun(),
 1734:     send_response(Msg, Chunk, Accept),
 1735:     custom_server_loop(Msg, Chunk, Accept, ReceiveFun).
 1736: 
 1737: custom_server_loop(Msg, Chunk, Accept, ReceiveFun) ->
 1738:     ReceiveFun(),
 1739:     send_response(Msg, Chunk, Accept),
 1740:     custom_server_loop(Msg, Chunk, Accept, ReceiveFun).
 1741: 
 1742: send_response(Msg, Chunk, Socket) ->
 1743:     inet:setopts(Socket, [{active, once}]),
 1744:     gen_tcp:send(Socket, Msg),
 1745:     timer:sleep(250),
 1746:     gen_tcp:send(Socket, Chunk).
 1747: 
 1748: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1749: head_chunked_empty_body() ->
 1750:     [{doc,"Test that HTTP responses (to HEAD requests) with 'Transfer-Encoding: chunked' and empty chunked-encoded body do not freeze the http client"}].
 1751: head_chunked_empty_body(_Config) ->
 1752:     Msg = "HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden\r\n" ++
 1753:         "Date: Thu, 23 Aug 2018 13:36:29 GMT\r\n" ++
 1754:         "Content-Type: text/html\r\n" ++
 1755:         "Server: inets/6.5.2.3\r\n" ++
 1756:         "Cache-Control: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1757:         "Pragma: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1758:         "Expires: Fri, 24 Aug 2018 07:49:35 GMT\r\n" ++
 1759:         "Transfer-Encoding: chunked\r\n" ++
 1760:         "\r\n",
 1761:     Chunk = "0\r\n\r\n",
 1762: 
 1763:     {ok, ListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active,once}, binary]),
 1764:     {ok,{_,Port}} = inet:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1765:     spawn(fun () -> custom_server(Msg, Chunk, ListenSocket,
 1766:                                   fun custom_receive/0) end),
 1767:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1768:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port),
 1769:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(head, {URL, []}, [], []),
 1770:     timer:sleep(500),
 1771:     %% Second request times out in the faulty case.
 1772:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(head, {URL, []}, [], []).
 1773: 
 1774: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1775: head_empty_body() ->
 1776:     [{doc,"Test that HTTP responses (to HEAD requests) with 'Transfer-Encoding: chunked' and empty body do not freeze the http client"}].
 1777: head_empty_body(_Config) ->
 1778:     Msg = "HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden\r\n" ++
 1779:         "Date: Thu, 23 Aug 2018 13:36:29 GMT\r\n" ++
 1780:         "Content-Type: text/html\r\n" ++
 1781:         "Server: inets/6.5.2.3\r\n" ++
 1782:         "Cache-Control: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1783:         "Pragma: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1784:         "Expires: Fri, 24 Aug 2018 07:49:35 GMT\r\n" ++
 1785:         "Transfer-Encoding: chunked\r\n" ++
 1786:         "\r\n",
 1787:     NoChunk = "", %% Do not chunk encode!
 1788: 
 1789:     {ok, ListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active,once}, binary]),
 1790:     {ok,{_,Port}} = inet:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1791:     spawn(fun () -> custom_server(Msg, NoChunk, ListenSocket,
 1792:                                   fun custom_receive/0) end),
 1793:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1794:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port),
 1795:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(head, {URL, []}, [], []),
 1796:     timer:sleep(500),
 1797:     %% Second request times out in the faulty case.
 1798:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(head, {URL, []}, [], []).
 1799: 
 1800: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1801: chunkify_fun() ->
 1802:     [{doc,"Test that a chunked encoded request does not include the 'Content-Length header'"}].
 1803: chunkify_fun(_Config) ->
 1804:     Msg = "HTTP/1.1 204 No Content\r\n" ++
 1805:         "Date: Thu, 23 Aug 2018 13:36:29 GMT\r\n" ++
 1806:         "Content-Type: text/html\r\n" ++
 1807:         "Server: inets/6.5.2.3\r\n" ++
 1808:         "Cache-Control: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1809:         "Pragma: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1810:         "Expires: Fri, 24 Aug 2018 07:49:35 GMT\r\n" ++
 1811:         "Transfer-Encoding: chunked\r\n" ++
 1812:         "\r\n",
 1813:     Chunk = "0\r\n\r\n",
 1814: 
 1815:     {ok, ListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active,once}, binary]),
 1816:     {ok,{_,Port}} = inet:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1817:     spawn(fun () -> custom_server(Msg, Chunk, ListenSocket,
 1818:                                   fun chunkify_receive/0) end),
 1819: 
 1820:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1821:     End = "/cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example",
 1822:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End,
 1823:     Fun = fun(_) -> {ok,<<1>>,eof_body} end,
 1824:     Acc = start,
 1825: 
 1826:     {ok, {{_,204,_}, _, _}} =
 1827:         httpc:request(put, {URL, [], "text/html", {chunkify, Fun, Acc}}, [], []).
 1828: 
 1829: chunkify_receive() ->
 1830:     Error = "HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error\r\n" ++
 1831:         "Content-Length: 0\r\n\r\n",
 1832:     receive
 1833:         {tcp, Port, Msg} ->
 1834:             case binary:match(Msg, <<"content-length">>) of
 1835:                 nomatch ->
 1836:                     ct:log("Message received: ~s", [binary_to_list(Msg)]);
 1837:                 {_, _} ->
 1838:                     ct:log("Message received (negative): ~s", [binary_to_list(Msg)]),
 1839:                     %% Signal a testcase failure when the received HTTP request
 1840:                     %% contains a 'Content-Length' header.
 1841:                     gen_tcp:send(Port, Error),
 1842:                     ct:fail("Content-Length present in received headers.")
 1843:             end
 1844:     after
 1845:         1000 ->
 1846:             ct:fail("Timeout: did not receive packet")
 1847:     end.
 1848: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1849: stream_fun_server_close() ->
 1850:     [{doc, "Test that an error msg is received when using a receiver fun as stream target"}].
 1851: stream_fun_server_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1852:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/delay_close.html", Config), []},
 1853:     Self = self(),
 1854:     Fun = fun(X) -> Self ! X end,
 1855:     {ok, RequestId} = httpc:request(get, Request, [], [{sync, false}, {receiver, Fun}]),
 1856:     receive
 1857:         {RequestId, {error, Reason}} ->
 1858:             ct:log("Close ~p", [Reason]),
 1859:             ok
 1860:     after 13000 ->
 1861:             ct:fail(did_not_receive_close)
 1862:     end. 
 1863: 
 1864: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1865: server_closing_connection_on_first_response() ->
 1866:     [{doc, "Client receives \"Connection: close\" on first response."
 1867:       "A client that receives a \"close\" connection option MUST cease sending"
 1868:       "requests on that connection and close the connection after reading"
 1869:       "the response message containing the \"close\""}].
 1870: server_closing_connection_on_first_response(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1871:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1872:     ReqSrvSendOctFun =
 1873:         fun(V, U, S) ->
 1874:                 {ok, {{V, S, _}, Headers0, []}} =
 1875:                     httpc:request(get, {U, []}, [{version, V}], RequestOpts),
 1876:                 {_, SendOctStr} =
 1877:                     proplists:lookup("x-socket-stat-send-oct", Headers0),
 1878:                 list_to_integer(SendOctStr)
 1879:         end,
 1880:     V = "HTTP/1.1",
 1881:     Url0 = url(group_name(Config), "/http_1_1_send_oct.html", Config),
 1882:     Url1 = url(group_name(Config), "/http_1_1_send_oct_and_connection_close.html", Config),
 1883:     %% Test case assumes at most one reusable past session.
 1884:     _ = ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url1, 204),
 1885:     0 = ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url0, 204),
 1886:     ok.
 1887: 
 1888: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1889: server_closing_connection_on_second_response() ->
 1890:     [{doc, "Client receives \"Connection: close\" on second response."
 1891:       "A client that receives a \"close\" connection option MUST cease sending"
 1892:       "requests on that connection and close the connection after reading"
 1893:       "the response message containing the \"close\""}].
 1894: server_closing_connection_on_second_response(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1895:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1896:     ReqSrvSendOctFun =
 1897:         fun(V, U, S) ->
 1898:                 {ok, {{V, S, _}, Headers0, []}} =
 1899:                     httpc:request(get, {U, []}, [{version, V}], RequestOpts),
 1900:                 {_, SendOctStr} =
 1901:                     proplists:lookup("x-socket-stat-send-oct", Headers0),
 1902:                 list_to_integer(SendOctStr)
 1903:         end,
 1904:     V = "HTTP/1.1",
 1905:     Url0 = url(group_name(Config), "/http_1_1_send_oct.html", Config),
 1906:     Url1 = url(group_name(Config), "/http_1_1_send_oct_and_connection_close.html", Config),
 1907:     %% Test case assumes no reusable past sessions.
 1908:     SendOct0 = 0 = ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url0, 204),
 1909:     case ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url1, 204) of SendOct1 when SendOct1 > SendOct0 -> ok end,
 1910:     0 = ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url0, 204),
 1911:     ok.
 1912: 
 1913: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1914: slow_connection() ->
 1915:     [{doc, "Test that a request on a slow keep-alive connection won't crash the httpc_manager"}].
 1916: slow_connection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1917:     BodyFun = fun(0) -> eof;
 1918:                  (LenLeft) -> timer:sleep(1000),
 1919:                               {ok, lists:duplicate(10, "1"), LenLeft - 10}
 1920:               end,
 1921:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/httpc_SUITE:esi_post", Config),
 1922:                 [{"content-length", "100"}],
 1923:                 "text/plain",
 1924:                 {BodyFun, 100}},
 1925:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(post, Request, [], []),
 1926:     %% Second request causes a crash if gen_server timeout is not set to infinity
 1927:     %% in httpc_handler.
 1928:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(post, Request, [], []).
 1929: 
 1930: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1931: unix_domain_socket() ->
 1932:     [{"doc, Test HTTP requests over unix domain sockets"}].
 1933: unix_domain_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1934: 
 1935:     URL = "http:///v1/kv/foo",
 1936: 
 1937:     {ok,[{unix_socket,?UNIX_SOCKET}]} =
 1938:         httpc:get_options([unix_socket]),
 1939:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], _}}
 1940: 	= httpc:request(put, {URL, [], [], ""}, [], []),
 1941:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], _}}
 1942:         = httpc:request(get, {URL, []}, [], []).
 1943: 
 1944: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1945: delete_no_body(doc) ->
 1946:     ["Test that a DELETE request without Body does not send a Content-Type header - Solves ERL-536"];
 1947: delete_no_body(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1948:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/delete_no_body.html", Config),
 1949:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1950:     %% Simulated server replies 500 if 'Content-Type' header is present
 1951:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, _, _}} =
 1952:         httpc:request(delete, {URL, []}, [], RequestOpts),
 1953:     {ok, {{_,500,_}, _, _}} =
 1954:         httpc:request(delete, {URL, [], "text/plain", "TEST"}, [], RequestOpts).
 1955: 
 1956: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1957: post_with_content_type(doc) ->
 1958:     ["Test that a POST request with explicit 'Content-Type' does not drop the 'Content-Type' header - Solves ERL-736"];
 1959: post_with_content_type(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1960:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/delete_no_body.html", Config),
 1961:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1962:     %% Simulated server replies 500 if 'Content-Type' header is present
 1963:     {ok, {{_,500,_}, _, _}} =
 1964:         httpc:request(post, {URL, [], "application/x-www-form-urlencoded", ""}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts).
 1965: 
 1966: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1967: request_options() ->
 1968:     [{require, ipv6_hosts},
 1969:      {doc, "Test http get request with socket options against local server (IPv6)"}].
 1970: request_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1971:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
 1972:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], _ = [_ | _]}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [],
 1973:                                                             [{socket_opts,[{ipfamily, inet6}]}]),
 1974:     {error,{failed_connect,_ }} = httpc:request(get, Request, [], []).
 1975: 
 1976: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1977: def_ssl_opt(_Config) ->
 1978:     CaCerts = public_key:cacerts_get(),
 1979:     Ver = {verify, verify_peer},
 1980:     Certs = {cacerts, CaCerts},
 1981:     [Ver, Certs] = httpc:ssl_verify_host_options(false),
 1982:     [Ver, Certs | WildCard] = httpc:ssl_verify_host_options(true),
 1983:     [{customize_hostname_check, [{match_fun, _}]}] = WildCard,
 1984:     {'EXIT', _} = catch httpc:ssl_verify_host_options(other),
 1985:     ok.
 1986: 
 1987: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1988: remote_socket_close_parallel() ->
 1989:     [{doc,
 1990:       "Verify remote socket closure (related tickets: OTP-18509, OTP-18545,"
 1991:       "ERIERL-937). Transferred data size needs to be significant, so that "
 1992:       "socket is closed, in the middle of a transfer."
 1993:       "Note: test case is require good network and CPU - due to that "
 1994:       " it is not included in all()."}].
 1995: remote_socket_close_parallel(Config0) when is_list(Config0) ->
 1996:     ClientNumber = 200,
 1997:     Config = [{iterations, 10} | Config0],
 1998:     ClientPids =
 1999:         [spawn(?MODULE, connect, [self(), [{client_id, Id} | Config]]) ||
 2000:             Id <- lists:seq(1, ClientNumber)],
 2001:     ct:log("Started ~p clients: ~w", [ClientNumber, ClientPids]),
 2002:     Receive = fun(S) ->
 2003:                       receive
 2004:                           ok ->
 2005:                               ct:log("++ Client finished (~p)", [S]),
 2006:                               ok;
 2007:                           Other ->
 2008:                               ct:fail(Other)
 2009:                       end
 2010:               end,
 2011:     [ok = Receive(S) || S <- lists:seq(1, ClientNumber)],
 2012:     ok.
 2013: 
 2014: connect(From, Config) ->
 2015:     From ! loop(?config(iterations, Config),
 2016:                 io_lib:format("C~p|", [?config(client_id, Config)]),
 2017:                 Config).
 2018: 
 2019: loop(0, Acc, _Config) ->
 2020:     ct:log("~n~s|", [Acc]),
 2021:     ok;
 2022: loop(Cnt, Acc, Config) ->
 2023:     case request(Config) of
 2024:         {ok, {{_,200,"OK"}, _, _}} ->
 2025:             case process_info(self(), message_queue_len) of
 2026:                 {message_queue_len,0} ->
 2027:                     loop(Cnt-1, Acc ++ ".", Config);
 2028:                 _ ->
 2029:                     %% queue is expected to be empty
 2030:                     queue_check(),
 2031:                     ct:pal("~n~s|", [Acc ++ "x"]),
 2032:                     fail
 2033:             end;
 2034:         {ok, NotOk} ->
 2035:             ct:pal("200 OK was not received~n~p", [NotOk]),
 2036:             fail;
 2037:         Error ->
 2038:             ct:pal("Error: ~p",[Error]),
 2039:             fail
 2040:     end.
 2041: 
 2042: queue_check() ->
 2043:     receive
 2044:         {http, {ReqId, {_Result, _Head, Data}}} when is_binary(Data) ->
 2045:             ct:pal("Unexpected data received: ~p ",
 2046:                       [ReqId]),
 2047:             queue_check();
 2048:         X ->
 2049:             ct:pal("Caught unexpected something else: ~p",[X]),
 2050:             queue_check()
 2051:     after 5000 ->
 2052:             done
 2053:     end.
 2054: 
 2055: request(Config) ->
 2056:     Request = {url(group_name(Config), "/httpc_SUITE/foo", Config), []},
 2057:     httpc:request(get, Request, [],[{sync,true}, {body_format,binary}]).
 2058: 
 2059: foo(SID, _Env, _Input) ->
 2060:     EightyMillionBits = 80000000, %% ~10MB transferred
 2061:     mod_esi:deliver(SID, [<<0:EightyMillionBits>>]).
 2062: 
 2063: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2064: %% Internal Functions ------------------------------------------------
 2065: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2066: stream(ReceiverPid, Receiver, Config) ->
 2067:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
 2068:     Options     = [{sync, false}, {receiver, Receiver}],
 2069:     {ok, RequestId} =
 2070: 	 httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], Options),
 2071:      Body =
 2072: 	 receive
 2073: 	     {reply, ReceiverPid, {RequestId, {{_, 200, _}, _, B}}} ->
 2074: 		 B;
 2075: 	     {reply, ReceiverPid, Msg} ->
 2076: 		 ct:fail(Msg);
 2077: 	     {bad_reply, ReceiverPid, Msg} ->
 2078: 		 ct:fail(Msg)
 2079: 	 end,
 2080: 
 2081:      inets_test_lib:check_body(binary_to_list(Body)).
 2082: 
 2083: create_receiver(Type) ->
 2084:     Parent = self(),
 2085:     Receiver = fun() -> receiver(Type, Parent) end,
 2086:     spawn_link(Receiver).
 2087: 
 2088: stop_receiver(Pid) ->
 2089:     Pid ! {stop, self()}.
 2090: 
 2091: receiver(Type, Parent) ->
 2092:     receive
 2093: 	{stop, Parent} ->
 2094: 	    ok;
 2095: 	{http, ReplyInfo} when (Type =:= pid) ->
 2096: 	    Parent ! {reply, self(), ReplyInfo},
 2097: 	    receiver(Type, Parent);
 2098: 
 2099: 	{Type, ReplyInfo} ->
 2100: 	    Parent ! {reply, self(), ReplyInfo},
 2101: 	    receiver(Type, Parent);
 2102: 
 2103: 	Crap ->
 2104: 	    Parent ! {reply, self(), {bad_reply, Crap}},
 2105: 	    receiver(Type, Parent)
 2106:     end.
 2107: 
 2108: stream_deliver_fun(ReceiverPid) ->
 2109:     fun(ReplyInfo) -> stream_deliver(ReplyInfo, function, ReceiverPid) end.
 2110: 
 2111: stream_deliver(ReplyInfo, Type, ReceiverPid) ->
 2112:     ReceiverPid ! {Type, ReplyInfo},
 2113:     ok.
 2114: 
 2115: stream_test(Request, To, RequestOpts) ->
 2116:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], Body}} =
 2117: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts),
 2118:     {ok, RequestId} =
 2119: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}, To | RequestOpts]),
 2120: 
 2121:     StreamedBody =
 2122: 	receive
 2123: 	    {http, {RequestId, stream_start, _Headers}} ->
 2124: 		receive_streamed_body(RequestId, <<>>);
 2125: 	    {http, {RequestId, stream_start, _Headers, Pid}}  ->
 2126: 		receive_streamed_body(RequestId, <<>>, Pid);
 2127: 	    {http, Msg} ->
 2128: 		ct:fail(Msg)
 2129: 	end,
 2130: 
 2131:     Body = binary_to_list(StreamedBody).
 2132: 
 2133: not_streamed_test(Request, To, RequestOpts) ->
 2134:     {ok, {{_,Code,_}, [_ | _], Body}} =
 2135: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{body_format, binary} | RequestOpts]),
 2136:     {ok, RequestId} =
 2137: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 2138:                       [{body_format, binary}, {sync, false}, To | RequestOpts]),
 2139: 
 2140:     receive
 2141: 	{http, {RequestId, {{_, Code, _}, _Headers, Body}}} ->
 2142: 	    {Code, binary_to_list(Body)};
 2143: 	{http, Msg} ->
 2144: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
 2145:     end.
 2146: 
 2147: url(Group, End, Config) when Group == http;
 2148:                              Group == sim_http;
 2149:                              Group == http_internal;
 2150:                              Group == http_internal_minimum_bytes ->
 2151:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 2152:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 2153:     ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End;
 2154: url(Group, End, Config) when Group == http_ipv6;
 2155:                              Group == sim_http_ipv6 ->
 2156:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 2157:     ?URL_START ++ "[::1]" ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End;
 2158: url(Group, End, Config) when Group == https;
 2159:                              Group == sim_https ->
 2160:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 2161:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 2162:     ?TLS_URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End.
 2163: 
 2164: url(Group, UserInfo, End, Config) when Group == http;
 2165:                                        Group == sim_http ->
 2166:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 2167:     {ok, Hostname} = inet:gethostname(),
 2168:     ?URL_START ++ UserInfo ++ "@" ++ Hostname ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End;
 2169: url(sim_http_ipv6, UserInfo, End, Config) ->
 2170:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 2171:     ?URL_START ++ UserInfo ++ "@" ++ "[::1]:" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End;
 2172: url(Group, UserInfo, End, Config) when Group == https;
 2173:                                        Group == sim_https ->
 2174:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 2175:     {ok, Hostname} = inet:gethostname(),
 2176:     ?TLS_URL_START ++ UserInfo ++ "@" ++ Hostname ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End.
 2177: 
 2178: % Only for use in the `mixed` test group, where both http and https
 2179: % URLs are possible.
 2180: mixed_url(http, End, Config) ->
 2181:     mixed_url(http_port, End, Config);
 2182: mixed_url(https, End, Config) ->
 2183:     mixed_url(https_port, End, Config);
 2184: mixed_url(PortType, End, Config) ->
 2185:     Port = proplists:get_value(PortType, Config),
 2186:     {ok, Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 2187:     Start = case PortType of
 2188:         http_port -> ?URL_START;
 2189:         https_port -> ?TLS_URL_START
 2190:     end,
 2191:     Start ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End.
 2192: 
 2193: group_name(Config) ->
 2194:     GroupProp = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
 2195:     proplists:get_value(name, GroupProp).
 2196: 
 2197: server_start(sim_http, _) ->
 2198:     Inet = inet_version(),
 2199:     ok = httpc:set_options([{ipfamily, Inet},{unix_socket, undefined}]),
 2200:     {_Pid, Port} = http_test_lib:dummy_server(ip_comm, Inet, [{content_cb, ?MODULE}]),
 2201:     Port;
 2202: 
 2203: server_start(sim_http_ipv6, _) ->
 2204:     ok = httpc:set_options([{ipfamily, inet6},{unix_socket, undefined}]),
 2205:     {_Pid, Port} = http_test_lib:dummy_server(ip_comm, inet6, [{content_cb, ?MODULE}]),
 2206:     Port;
 2207: 
 2208: server_start(sim_https, SslConfig) ->
 2209:     Inet = inet_version(),
 2210:     ok = httpc:set_options([{ipfamily, Inet},{unix_socket, undefined}]),
 2211:     {_Pid, Port} = http_test_lib:dummy_server(ssl, Inet, [{ssl, SslConfig}, {content_cb, ?MODULE}]),
 2212:     Port;
 2213: 
 2214: server_start(http_unix_socket, Config) ->
 2215:     Inet = local,
 2216:     Socket = proplists:get_value(unix_socket, Config),
 2217:     ok = httpc:set_options([{ipfamily, Inet},{unix_socket, Socket}]),
 2218:     {Pid, Port} = http_test_lib:dummy_server(unix_socket, Inet, [{content_cb, ?MODULE},
 2219:                                                                   {unix_socket, Socket}]),
 2220:     {Pid, Port};
 2221: server_start(http_ipv6, HttpdConfig) ->
 2222:     {ok, Pid} = inets:start(httpd, HttpdConfig),
 2223:     Serv = inets:services_info(),
 2224:     {value, {_, _, Info}} = lists:keysearch(Pid, 2, Serv),
 2225:     proplists:get_value(port, Info);
 2226: server_start(sim_mixed, Config) ->
 2227:     % For the mixed http/https case, we start two servers and return both ports.
 2228:     {server_start(sim_http, []), server_start(sim_https, Config)};
 2229: server_start(_, HttpdConfig) ->
 2230:     {ok, Pid} = inets:start(httpd, HttpdConfig),
 2231:     Serv = inets:services_info(),
 2232:     ok = httpc:set_options([{ipfamily, inet_version()},{unix_socket, undefined}]),
 2233:     {value, {_, _, Info}} = lists:keysearch(Pid, 2, Serv),
 2234:     proplists:get_value(port, Info).
 2235: 
 2236: server_config(base, Config) ->
 2237:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2238:     [{port, 0},
 2239:      {server_name,"httpc_test"},
 2240:      {server_root, ServerRoot},
 2241:      {document_root, proplists:get_value(doc_root, Config)},
 2242:      {mime_type, "text/plain"}];
 2243: server_config(base_http, Config) ->
 2244:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2245:     server_config(base, Config) ++
 2246:         [{script_alias,
 2247:           {"/cgi-bin/", filename:join(ServerRoot, "cgi-bin") ++ "/"}}];
 2248: server_config(http, Config) ->
 2249:     server_config(base_http, Config) ++
 2250:         [{bind_address, any},
 2251:          {ipfamily, inet_version()}];
 2252: server_config(http_ipv6, Config) ->
 2253:     server_config(base_http, Config) ++
 2254:         [{bind_address, {0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1}},
 2255:          {ipfamily, inet6}];
 2256: server_config(http_internal, Config) ->
 2257:     server_config(http, Config) ++
 2258:         [{erl_script_alias, {"", [httpc_SUITE]}}];
 2259: server_config(http_internal_minimum_bytes, Config) ->
 2260:     server_config(http_internal, Config) ++
 2261:         [{minimum_bytes_per_second, 100}];
 2262: server_config(https, Config) ->
 2263:     [{socket_type, {ssl, ssl_config(Config)}} | server_config(http, Config)];
 2264: server_config(sim_https, Config) ->
 2265:     ssl_config(Config);
 2266: server_config(http_unix_socket, _Config) ->
 2267:     Socket = ?UNIX_SOCKET,
 2268:     [{unix_socket, Socket}];
 2269: server_config(_, _) ->
 2270:     [].
 2271: 
 2272: esi_post(Sid, _Env, _Input) ->
 2273:     mod_esi:deliver(Sid, ["OK"]).
 2274: 
 2275: start_apps(https) ->
 2276:     inets_test_lib:start_apps([crypto, public_key, ssl]);
 2277: start_apps(sim_https) ->
 2278:     inets_test_lib:start_apps([crypto, public_key, ssl]);
 2279: start_apps(sim_mixed) ->
 2280:     inets_test_lib:start_apps([crypto, public_key, ssl]);
 2281: start_apps(_) ->
 2282:     ok.
 2283: 
 2284: ssl_config(Config) ->
 2285:     SSLConf = proplists:get_value(ssl_conf, Config),
 2286:     proplists:get_value(server_config, SSLConf).
 2287: 
 2288: setup_server_dirs(ServerRoot, DocRoot, DataDir) ->   
 2289:     CgiDir =  filename:join(ServerRoot, "cgi-bin"),
 2290:     ok = file:make_dir(ServerRoot),
 2291:     ok = file:make_dir(DocRoot),
 2292:     ok = file:make_dir(CgiDir),
 2293: 
 2294:     {ok, Files} = file:list_dir(DataDir),
 2295:     
 2296:     lists:foreach(fun(File) -> case lists:suffix(".html", File) of
 2297: 				   true ->
 2298: 				       inets_test_lib:copy_file(File, 
 2299: 								DataDir, 
 2300: 								DocRoot);
 2301: 				   false ->
 2302: 				       ok
 2303: 			       end
 2304: 		  end, Files),
 2305:     
 2306:     Cgi = case os:type() of
 2307: 	      {win32, _} ->
 2308: 		  "cgi_echo.exe";
 2309: 	      _ ->
 2310: 		  "cgi_echo"
 2311: 	  end,
 2312:     
 2313:     {ok, _} = inets_test_lib:copy_file(Cgi, DataDir, CgiDir),
 2314:     AbsCgi = filename:join([CgiDir, Cgi]),
 2315:     {ok, FileInfo} = file:read_file_info(AbsCgi),
 2316:     ok = file:write_file_info(AbsCgi, FileInfo#file_info{mode = 8#00755}).
 2317: 
 2318: 
 2319: keep_alive_requests(Request, Profile) ->
 2320:     {ok, RequestIdA0} =
 2321: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2322:     {ok, RequestIdA1} =
 2323: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2324:     {ok, RequestIdA2} =
 2325: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2326: 
 2327:     receive_replys([RequestIdA0, RequestIdA1, RequestIdA2]),
 2328: 
 2329:     {ok, RequestIdB0} =
 2330: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2331:     {ok, RequestIdB1} =
 2332: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2333:     {ok, RequestIdB2} =
 2334: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2335: 
 2336:     ok = httpc:cancel_request(RequestIdB1, Profile),
 2337:     ct:log("Cancel ~p~n", [RequestIdB1]),
 2338:     receive_replys([RequestIdB0, RequestIdB2]).
 2339: 
 2340: receive_replys([]) ->
 2341:     ok;
 2342: receive_replys([ID|IDs]) ->
 2343:     receive
 2344: 	{http, {ID, {{_, 200, _}, [_|_], _}}} ->
 2345: 	    receive_replys(IDs);
 2346: 	{http, {Other, {{_, 200, _}, [_|_], _}}} ->
 2347: 	    ct:pal("~p",[{recived_canceld_id, Other}])
 2348:     end.
 2349: 
 2350: inet_version() ->
 2351:     inet. %% Just run inet for now
 2352:     %% case gen_tcp:listen(0,[inet6]) of
 2353:     %% 	{ok, S} ->
 2354:     %% 	    gen_tcp:close(S),
 2355:     %% 	    inet6;
 2356:     %% 	_ ->
 2357:     %% 	    inet
 2358:     %%end.
 2359: 
 2360: handle_request(Module, Function, Args, Socket) ->
 2361:     case Module:Function(Args) of
 2362: 	{ok, Result} ->
 2363: 	    case handle_http_msg(Result, Socket, []) of
 2364: 		stop ->
 2365: 		    stop;
 2366: 		<<>> ->
 2367: 		    {httpd_request, parse, [[{max_uri,?HTTP_MAX_URI_SIZE},
 2368: 					     {max_header, ?HTTP_MAX_HEADER_SIZE},
 2369: 					     {max_version,?HTTP_MAX_VERSION_STRING}, 
 2370: 					     {max_method, ?HTTP_MAX_METHOD_STRING},
 2371: 					     {max_content_length, ?HTTP_MAX_CONTENT_LENGTH},
 2372: 					     {customize, httpd_custom}
 2373: 					    ]]};
 2374: 		Data ->	
 2375: 		    handle_request(httpd_request, parse, 
 2376: 				   [Data, [{max_uri,    ?HTTP_MAX_URI_SIZE},
 2377: 					   {max_header, ?HTTP_MAX_HEADER_SIZE},
 2378: 					    {max_version,?HTTP_MAX_VERSION_STRING}, 
 2379: 					    {max_method, ?HTTP_MAX_METHOD_STRING},
 2380: 					    {max_content_length, ?HTTP_MAX_CONTENT_LENGTH},
 2381: 					   {customize, httpd_custom}
 2382: 					  ]], Socket)
 2383: 	    end;
 2384: 	NewMFA ->
 2385: 	    NewMFA
 2386:     end.
 2387: 
 2388: handle_http_msg({Method, RelUri, _, {_, Headers}, Body}, Socket, _) ->
 2389:     ct:log("Request: ~p ~p", [Method, RelUri]),
 2390: 
 2391:     NextRequest = 
 2392: 	case RelUri of
 2393: 	    "/dummy_headers.html" ->
 2394: 		<<>>;
 2395: 	    "/no_headers.html" ->
 2396: 		stop;
 2397: 	    "/just_close.html" ->
 2398: 		stop;
 2399: 	    _ ->
 2400: 		ContentLength = content_length(Headers),    
 2401: 		case byte_size(Body) - ContentLength of
 2402: 		    0 ->
 2403: 			<<>>;
 2404: 		    _ ->
 2405: 			<<_BodyThisReq:ContentLength/binary, 
 2406: 			  Next/binary>> = Body,
 2407: 			Next
 2408: 		end
 2409: 	end,
 2410:    
 2411:     case global:trans({cookies, verify}, fun() -> unset end, [node()], 0) of
 2412:         aborted->
 2413:             % somebody has the lock and wants us to check
 2414:             check_cookie(Headers);
 2415:         unset ->
 2416:             ok
 2417:     end,
 2418: 
 2419:    {ok, {_, Port}} = sockname(Socket),
 2420: 
 2421: 
 2422:     DefaultResponse = "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++
 2423: 	"Content-Length:32\r\n\r\n"
 2424: 	"<HTML><BODY>foobar</BODY></HTML>",
 2425: 
 2426:     Msg = handle_uri(Method,RelUri, Port, Headers, Socket, DefaultResponse),
 2427: 
 2428:     case Msg of
 2429: 	ok ->
 2430: 	    ok;
 2431: 	close ->
 2432: 	    %% Nothing to send, just close
 2433: 	    close(Socket);
 2434: 	_ when is_list(Msg) orelse is_binary(Msg) ->
 2435: 	    case Msg of
 2436: 		[] ->
 2437: 		    ct:log("Empty Msg", []);
 2438: 		_ ->
 2439: 		    ct:log("Response: ~p", [Msg]),
 2440: 		    send(Socket, Msg)
 2441: 	    end
 2442:     end,
 2443:     NextRequest.
 2444: 
 2445: ensure_host_header_with_port([]) ->
 2446:     false;
 2447: ensure_host_header_with_port([{"host", Host}| _]) ->
 2448:     case string:tokens(Host, [$:]) of
 2449: 	[_ActualHost, _Port] ->
 2450: 	    true;
 2451: 	_ ->
 2452: 	    false
 2453:     end;
 2454: ensure_host_header_with_port([_|T]) ->
 2455:     ensure_host_header_with_port(T).
 2456: 
 2457: auth_header([]) ->
 2458:     auth_header_not_found;
 2459: auth_header([{"authorization", Value} | _]) ->
 2460:     {ok, string:strip(Value)};
 2461: auth_header([_ | Tail]) ->
 2462:     auth_header(Tail).
 2463: 
 2464: content_type_header([]) ->
 2465:     not_found;
 2466: content_type_header([{"content-type", Value}|_]) ->
 2467:     {ok, string:strip(Value)};
 2468: content_type_header([_|T]) ->
 2469:     content_type_header(T).
 2470: 
 2471: handle_auth("Basic " ++ UserInfo, Challenge, DefaultResponse) ->
 2472:     case string:tokens(base64:decode_to_string(UserInfo), ":") of
 2473: 	["alladin", "sesame"] = Auth ->
 2474: 	    ct:log("Auth: ~p~n", [Auth]),
 2475: 	    DefaultResponse;
 2476: 	Other ->
 2477: 	    ct:log("UnAuth: ~p~n", [Other]),
 2478: 	    Challenge
 2479:     end.
 2480: 
 2481: check_cookie([]) ->
 2482:     ct:fail(no_cookie_header);
 2483: check_cookie([{"cookie", _} | _]) ->
 2484:     ok;
 2485: check_cookie([_Head | Tail]) ->
 2486:    check_cookie(Tail).
 2487: 
 2488: content_length([]) ->
 2489:     0;
 2490: content_length([{"content-length", Value}|_]) ->
 2491:     list_to_integer(string:strip(Value));
 2492: content_length([_Head | Tail]) ->
 2493:    content_length(Tail).
 2494: 
 2495: handle_uri("GET","/dummy.html?foo=bar",_,_,_,_) ->
 2496:     "HTTP/1.0 200 OK\r\n\r\nTEST";
 2497: 
 2498: handle_uri("GET","/space%20.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2499:     Body = "<HTML><BODY>foobar</BODY></HTML>",
 2500:     "HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n" ++
 2501:         "Content-Length:" ++ integer_to_list(length(Body)) ++ "\r\n\r\n" ++
 2502:         Body;

 2513:     Body = "TRACE /trace.html simulate HTTP TRACE ",
 2514:     "HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n" ++ "Content-Length:" ++ integer_to_list(length(Body)) ++ "\r\n\r\n" ++ Body;

 2516: handle_uri(_,"/ensure_host_header_with_port.html",_,Headers,_,_) ->
 2517:     case ensure_host_header_with_port(Headers) of
 2518: 	true ->
 2519: 	    B =
 2520: 		"<HTML><BODY>" ++
 2521: 		"host with port" ++
 2522: 		"</BODY></HTML>",
 2523: 	    Len = integer_to_list(length(B)),
 2524: 	    "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++
 2525: 		"Content-Length:" ++ Len ++ "\r\n\r\n" ++ B;
 2526: 	false ->
 2527: 	    B =
 2528: 		"<HTML><BODY>" ++
 2529: 		"Internal Server Error - host without port" ++
 2530: 		"</BODY></HTML>",
 2531: 	    Len = integer_to_list(length(B)),
 2532: 	    "HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error\r\n" ++
 2533: 		"Content-Length:" ++ Len ++ "\r\n\r\n" ++ B
 2534:     end;
 2535: handle_uri(_,"/redirect_ensure_host_header_with_port.html",Port,_,Socket,_) ->
 2536:     NewUri = url_start(Socket) ++
 2537: 	integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/ensure_host_header_with_port.html",
 2538:     "HTTP/1.1 302 Found \r\n" ++
 2539: 	"Location:" ++ NewUri ++  "\r\n" ++
 2540: 	"Content-Length:0\r\n\r\n";

 2668: handle_uri(_,"/500.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2669:     "HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error\r\n" ++

 2671: 	"<HTML><BODY>Internal Server Error</BODY></HTML>";

 2673: handle_uri(_,"/503.html",_,_,_,DefaultResponse) ->
 2674:     case ets:lookup(unavailable, 503) of
 2675: 	[{503, unavailable}] ->
 2676: 	    ets:insert(unavailable, {503, available}),
 2677: 	    "HTTP/1.1 503 Service Unavailable\r\n" ++
 2678: 		"Retry-After:5\r\n" ++
 2679: 		"Content-Length:47\r\n\r\n" ++
 2680: 		"<HTML><BODY>Internal Server Error</BODY></HTML>";
 2681: 	[{503, available}]   ->
 2682: 	    DefaultResponse;
 2683: 	[{503, long_unavailable}]  ->
 2684: 	    "HTTP/1.1 503 Service Unavailable\r\n" ++
 2685: 		"Retry-After:120\r\n" ++
 2686: 		"Content-Length:47\r\n\r\n" ++
 2687: 		"<HTML><BODY>Internal Server Error</BODY></HTML>"
 2688:     end;
 2689: 
 2690: handle_uri(_,"/redirectloop.html",Port,_,Socket,_) ->
 2691:     %% Create a potential endless loop!
 2692:     NewUri = url_start(Socket) ++
 2693: 	integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/redirectloop.html",
 2694:      Body = "<HTML><BODY><a href=" ++ NewUri ++
 2695: 	">New place</a></BODY></HTML>",
 2696:     "HTTP/1.1 300 Multiple Choices\r\n" ++
 2697: 	"Location:" ++ NewUri ++  "\r\n" ++
 2698: 	"Content-Length:" ++ integer_to_list(length(Body))
 2699: 	++ "\r\n\r\n" ++ Body;
 2700: 
 2701: handle_uri(_,"/userinfo.html", _,Headers,_, DefaultResponse) ->
 2702:     Challenge = "HTTP/1.1 401 Unauthorized \r\n" ++
 2703: 	"WWW-Authenticate:Basic" ++"\r\n" ++
 2704: 	"Content-Length:0\r\n\r\n",
 2705:     case auth_header(Headers) of
 2706: 	{ok, Value} ->
 2707: 	    handle_auth(Value, Challenge, DefaultResponse);
 2708: 	_ ->
 2709: 	    Challenge
 2710:     end;
 2711: 
 2712: handle_uri(_,"/dummy_headers.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2713:     %% The client will only care about the Transfer-Encoding
 2714:     %% header the rest of these headers are left to the
 2715:     %% user to evaluate. This is not a valid response
 2716:     %% it only tests that the header handling code works.
 2717:     Head = "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++
 2718: 	"Pragma:1#no-cache\r\n"  ++
 2719: 	"Via:1.0 fred, 1.1 nowhere.com (Apache/1.1)\r\n"  ++
 2720: 	"Warning:1#pseudonym foobar\r\n"  ++
 2721: 	"Vary:*\r\n"  ++
 2722: 	"Trailer:Other:inets_test\r\n"  ++
 2723: 	"Upgrade:HTTP/2.0\r\n"  ++
 2724: 	"Age:4711\r\n" ++
 2725: 	"Transfer-Encoding:chunked\r\n" ++
 2726: 	"Content-Encoding:foo\r\n" ++
 2727: 	"Content-Language:en\r\n"  ++
 2728: 	"Content-Location:http://www.foobar.se\r\n"  ++
 2729: 	"Content-MD5:104528739076276072743283077410617235478\r\n"
 2730: 	++
 2731: 	"Content-Range:Sat, 29 Oct 1994 19:43:31 GMT\r\n"  ++
 2732: 	"Expires:Sat, 29 Oct 1994 19:43:31 GMT\r\n"  ++
 2733: 	"Proxy-Authenticate:#1Basic"  ++
 2734: 	"\r\n\r\n",
 2735:     send(Socket, Head),
 2736:     send(Socket, http_chunk:encode("<HTML><BODY>fo")),
 2737:     send(Socket, http_chunk:encode("obar</BODY></HTML>")),
 2738:     http_chunk:encode_last();
 2739: 
 2740: handle_uri(_,"/obs_folded_headers.html",_,_,_,_) ->

 2742:     "Content-Length:5\r\n"
 2743:     "Folded: a\r\n"
 2744:     " b\r\n\r\n"
 2745:     "Hello";

 2838: handle_uri(_,"/http_1_0_no_length_single.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->

 2845: handle_uri(_,"/http_1_0_no_length_multiple.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2846:     Head = "HTTP/1.0 200 ok\r\n"
 2847:         "Content-type:text/plain\r\n\r\n"
 2848:         "multiple packets, ",
 2849:     send(Socket, Head),
 2850:     %% long body to make sure it will be sent in multiple tcp packets
 2851:     send(Socket, string:copies("other multiple packets ", 200)),
 2852:     close(Socket);
 2853: 
 2854: handle_uri(_,"/large_404_response.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2855:     %% long body to make sure it will be sent in multiple tcp packets
 2856:     Body = string:copies("other multiple packets ", 200),
 2857:     Head = io_lib:format("HTTP/1.1 404 not found\r\n"
 2858:                          "Content-length: ~B\r\n"
 2859:                          "Content-type: text/plain\r\n\r\n",
 2860:                          [length(Body)]),
 2861:     send(Socket, Head),
 2862:     send(Socket, Body),
 2863:     close(Socket);
 2864:

 2870:     ct:sleep(1000),
 2871:     send(Socket, "ob"),
 2872:     ct:sleep(1000),
 2873:     send(Socket, "ar</BODY></HTML>");

 2893: handle_uri(_,"/multipart_chunks.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->

 2925: handle_uri(_,"/http_1_1_send_oct_and_connection_close.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2926:     "HTTP/1.1 204 No Content\r\n" ++
 2927:         "X-Socket-Stat-Send-Oct: " ++ integer_to_list(get_stat(Socket, send_oct)) ++ "\r\n" ++
 2928:         "Connection: close\r\n" ++
 2929:         "\r\n";
 2930: handle_uri(_,"/delete_no_body.html", _,Headers,_, DefaultResponse) ->
 2931:     Error = "HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error\r\n" ++
 2932: 	"Content-Length:0\r\n\r\n",
 2933:     case content_type_header(Headers) of
 2934: 	{ok, _} ->
 2935: 	    Error;
 2936: 	not_found ->
 2937: 	    DefaultResponse
 2938:     end;
 2939: handle_uri(_,_,_,_,_,DefaultResponse) ->
 2940:     DefaultResponse.
 2941: 
 2942: get_stat(S, Opt) ->
 2943:     case getstat(S, [Opt]) of
 2944:         {ok, [{Opt, V}]} when is_integer(V) ->
 2945:             V;
 2946:         {error, _} = E ->
 2947:             E
 2948:     end.
 2949: 
 2950: getstat(#sslsocket{} = S, Opts) ->
 2951:     ssl:getstat(S, Opts);
 2952: getstat(S, Opts) ->
 2953:     inet:getstat(S, Opts).
 2954: 
 2955: url_start(#sslsocket{}) ->
 2956:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 2957:     ?TLS_URL_START ++ Host ++ ":";
 2958: url_start(_) ->
 2959:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 2960:     ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":".
 2961: 
 2962: send(#sslsocket{} = S, Msg) ->
 2963:     ssl:send(S, Msg);
 2964: send(S, Msg) ->
 2965:     gen_tcp:send(S, Msg).
 2966: 
 2967: close(#sslsocket{} = S) ->
 2968:     ssl:close(S);
 2969: close(S) ->
 2970:     gen_tcp:close(S).
 2971: 
 2972: sockname(#sslsocket{}= S) ->
 2973:     ssl:sockname(S);
 2974: sockname(S) ->
 2975:     inet:sockname(S).
 2976: 
 2977: receive_streamed_body(RequestId, Body) ->
 2978:     receive
 2979: 	{http, {RequestId, stream, BinBodyPart}} ->
 2980: 	    receive_streamed_body(RequestId,
 2981: 				  <<Body/binary, BinBodyPart/binary>>);
 2982: 	{http, {RequestId, stream_end, _Headers}} ->
 2983: 	    Body;
 2984: 	{http, Msg} ->
 2985: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
 2986:     end.
 2987: 
 2988: receive_streamed_body(RequestId, Body, Pid) ->
 2989:     httpc:stream_next(Pid),
 2990:     ct:log("~p:receive_streamed_body -> requested next stream ~n", [?MODULE]),
 2991:     receive
 2992: 	{http, {RequestId, stream, BinBodyPart}} ->
 2993: 	    %% Make sure the httpc hasn't sent us the next 'stream'
 2994: 	    %% without our request.
 2995: 	    receive
 2996: 		{http, {RequestId, stream, _}} = Msg ->
 2997: 		    ct:fail({unexpected_flood_of_stream, Msg})
 2998: 	    after
 2999: 		1000 ->
 3000: 		    ok
 3001: 	    end,
 3002: 	    receive_streamed_body(RequestId,
 3003: 				  <<Body/binary, BinBodyPart/binary>>,
 3004: 				  Pid);
 3005: 	{http, {RequestId, stream_end, _Headers}} ->
 3006: 	    Body;
 3007: 	{http, Msg} ->
 3008: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
 3009:     end.
 3010: 
 3011: %% -----------------------------------------------------
 3012: %% A sequence number handler
 3013: %% The purpose is to be able to pair requests with responses.
 3014: 
 3015: start_sequence_number_server() ->
 3016:     proc_lib:spawn(fun() -> loop_sequence_number(1) end).
 3017: 
 3018: loop_sequence_number(N) ->
 3019:     receive
 3020: 	shutdown ->
 3021: 	    ok;
 3022: 	{From, get_next} ->
 3023: 	    From ! {next_is, N},
 3024: 	    loop_sequence_number(N + 1)
 3025:     end.
 3026: 
 3027: get_next_sequence_number(SeqNumServer) ->
 3028:     SeqNumServer ! {self(), get_next},
 3029:     receive {next_is, N} -> N end.
 3030: 
 3031: %% -----------------------------------------------------
 3032: %% Client part
 3033: %% Sends requests randomly parallel
 3034: 
 3035: run_clients(NumClients, ServerPort, SeqNumServer) ->
 3036:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 3037:     set_random_seed(),
 3038:     lists:map(
 3039:       fun(Id) ->
 3040: 	      Req = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("req~3..0w", [get_next_sequence_number(SeqNumServer)])),
 3041: 	      Url = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(ServerPort) ++  "/" ++ Req,
 3042: 	      Pid = proc_lib:spawn(
 3043: 		      fun() ->
 3044: 			      case httpc:request(Url) of
 3045: 				  {ok, {{_,200,_}, _, Resp}} ->
 3046: 				      ct:log("[~w] 200 response: "
 3047: 					       "~p~n", [Id, Resp]),
 3048: 				      case lists:prefix(Req++"->", Resp) of
 3049: 					  true -> exit(normal);
 3050: 					  false -> exit({bad_resp,Req,Resp})
 3051: 				      end;
 3052: 				  {ok, {{_,EC,Reason},_,Resp}}  ->
 3053: 				      ct:pal("[~w] ~w response: "
 3054: 					       "~s~n~s~n",
 3055: 					       [Id, EC, Reason, Resp]),
 3056: 				      exit({bad_resp,Req,Resp});
 3057: 				  Crap ->
 3058: 				      ct:pal("[~w] bad response: ~p",
 3059: 					       [Id, Crap]),
 3060: 				      exit({bad_resp, Req, Crap})
 3061: 			      end
 3062: 		      end),
 3063: 	      MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 3064: 	      timer:sleep(10 + rand:uniform(1334)),
 3065: 	      {Id, Pid, MRef}
 3066:       end,
 3067:       lists:seq(1, NumClients)).
 3068: 
 3069: wait4clients([], _Timeout) ->
 3070:     ok;
 3071: wait4clients(Clients, Timeout) when Timeout > 0 ->
 3072:     Time = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 3073: 
 3074:     receive
 3075: 	{'DOWN', _MRef, process, Pid, normal} ->
 3076: 	    {value, {Id, _, _}} = lists:keysearch(Pid, 2, Clients),
 3077: 	    NewClients = lists:keydelete(Id, 1, Clients),
 3078: 	    wait4clients(NewClients, Timeout - inets_lib:millisec_passed(Time));
 3079: 	{'DOWN', _MRef, process, Pid, Reason} ->
 3080: 	    {value, {Id, _, _}} = lists:keysearch(Pid, 2, Clients),
 3081: 	    ct:fail({bad_client_termination, Id, Reason})
 3082:     after Timeout ->
 3083: 	    ct:fail({client_timeout, Clients})
 3084:     end;
 3085: wait4clients(Clients, _) ->
 3086:     ct:fail({client_timeout, Clients}).
 3087: 
 3088: 
 3089: %% -----------------------------------------------------
 3090: %% Webserver part:
 3091: %% Implements a web server that sends responses one character
 3092: %% at a time, with random delays between the characters.
 3093: 
 3094: start_slow_server(SeqNumServer) ->
 3095:     proc_lib:start(
 3096:       erlang, apply, [fun() -> init_slow_server(SeqNumServer) end, []]).
 3097: 
 3098: init_slow_server(SeqNumServer) ->
 3099:     Inet = inet_version(),
 3100:     {ok, LSock} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [binary, Inet, {packet,0}, {active,true},
 3101: 				     {backlog, 100}]),
 3102:     {ok, {_IP, Port}} = inet:sockname(LSock),
 3103:     proc_lib:init_ack({ok, self(), Port}),
 3104:     loop_slow_server(LSock, SeqNumServer).
 3105: 
 3106: loop_slow_server(LSock, SeqNumServer) ->
 3107:     Master = self(),
 3108:     Acceptor = proc_lib:spawn(
 3109: 		 fun() -> client_handler(Master, LSock, SeqNumServer) end),
 3110:     receive
 3111: 	{accepted, Acceptor} ->
 3112: 	    loop_slow_server(LSock, SeqNumServer);
 3113: 	shutdown ->
 3114: 	    gen_tcp:close(LSock),
 3115: 	    exit(Acceptor, kill)
 3116:     end.
 3117: 
 3118: 
 3119: %% Handle one client connection
 3120: client_handler(Master, LSock, SeqNumServer) ->
 3121:     {ok, CSock} = gen_tcp:accept(LSock),
 3122:     Master ! {accepted, self()},
 3123:     set_random_seed(),
 3124:     loop_client(1, CSock, SeqNumServer).
 3125: 
 3126: loop_client(N, CSock, SeqNumServer) ->
 3127:     %% Await request, don't bother parsing it too much,
 3128:     %% assuming the entire request arrives in one packet.
 3129:     receive
 3130: 	{tcp, CSock, Req} ->
 3131: 	    ReqNum = parse_req_num(Req),
 3132: 	    RespSeqNum = get_next_sequence_number(SeqNumServer),
 3133: 	    Response = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~s->resp~3..0w/~2..0w", [ReqNum, RespSeqNum, N])),
 3134: 	    Txt = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("Slow server (~p) got ~p, answering with ~p",
 3135: 					      [self(), Req, Response])),
 3136: 	    ct:log("~s...~n", [Txt]),
 3137: 	    slowly_send_response(CSock, Response),
 3138: 	    case parse_connection_type(Req) of
 3139: 		keep_alive ->
 3140: 		    ct:log("~s...done~n", [Txt]),
 3141: 		    loop_client(N+1, CSock, SeqNumServer);
 3142: 		close ->
 3143: 		    ct:log("~s...done (closing)~n", [Txt]),
 3144: 		    gen_tcp:close(CSock)
 3145: 	    end
 3146:     end.
 3147: 
 3148: slowly_send_response(CSock, Answer) ->
 3149:     Response =  lists:flatten(io_lib:format("HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\nContent-Length: ~w\r\n\r\n~s",
 3150: 					    [length(Answer), Answer])),
 3151:     lists:foreach(
 3152:       fun(Char) ->
 3153: 	      timer:sleep(rand:uniform(500)),
 3154: 	      gen_tcp:send(CSock, <<Char>>)
 3155:       end,
 3156:       Response).
 3157: 
 3158: parse_req_num(Request) ->
 3159:     Opts = [caseless,{capture,all_but_first,list}],
 3160:     {match, [ReqNum]} = re:run(Request, "GET /(.*) HTTP", Opts),
 3161:     ReqNum.
 3162: 
 3163: parse_connection_type(Request) ->
 3164:     Opts = [caseless,{capture,all_but_first,list}],
 3165:     {match,[CType]} = re:run(Request, "connection: *(keep-alive|close)", Opts),
 3166:     case string:to_lower(CType) of
 3167: 	"close" -> close;
 3168: 	"keep-alive" -> keep_alive
 3169:     end.
 3170: 
 3171: set_random_seed() ->
 3172:     Unique = erlang:unique_integer(),
 3173:     A = erlang:phash2([make_ref(), self(), Unique]),
 3174:     rand:seed(exsplus, {A, A, A}).
 3175: 
 3176: 
 3177: otp_8739(doc) ->
 3178:     ["OTP-8739"];
 3179: otp_8739(suite) ->
 3180:     [];
 3181: otp_8739(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3182:     {_DummyServerPid, Port} = otp_8739_dummy_server(),
 3183:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 3184:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/dummy.html",
 3185:     Method      = get,
 3186:     Request     = {URL, []},
 3187:     HttpOptions = [{connect_timeout, 500}, {timeout, 1}],
 3188:     Options     = [{sync, true}],
 3189:     case httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOptions, Options) of
 3190: 	{error, timeout} ->
 3191: 	    %% And now we check the size of the handler db
 3192: 	    Info = httpc:info(),
 3193: 	    ct:log("Info: ~p", [Info]),
 3194: 	    {value, {handlers, Handlers}} =
 3195: 		lists:keysearch(handlers, 1, Info),
 3196: 	    case Handlers of
 3197: 		[] ->
 3198: 		    ok;
 3199: 		_ ->
 3200: 		    ct:fail({unexpected_handlers, Handlers})
 3201: 	    end;
 3202: 	Unexpected ->
 3203: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, Unexpected})
 3204:     end.
 3205: 
 3206: otp_8739_dummy_server() ->
 3207:     Parent = self(),
 3208:     Pid = spawn_link(fun() -> otp_8739_dummy_server_init(Parent) end),
 3209:     receive
 3210: 	{port, Port} ->
 3211: 	    {Pid, Port}
 3212:     end.
 3213: 
 3214: otp_8739_dummy_server_init(Parent) ->
 3215:     Inet = inet_version(),
 3216:     {ok, ListenSocket} =
 3217: 	gen_tcp:listen(0, [binary, Inet, {packet, 0},
 3218: 			   {reuseaddr,true},
 3219: 			   {active, false}]),
 3220:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(ListenSocket),
 3221:     Parent ! {port, Port},
 3222:     otp_8739_dummy_server_main(Parent, ListenSocket).
 3223: 
 3224: otp_8739_dummy_server_main(_Parent, ListenSocket) ->
 3225:     case gen_tcp:accept(ListenSocket) of
 3226: 	{ok, Sock} ->
 3227: 	    %% Ignore the request, and simply wait for the socket to close
 3228: 	    receive
 3229: 		{tcp_closed, Sock} ->
 3230: 		    (catch gen_tcp:close(ListenSocket)),
 3231: 		    exit(normal);
 3232: 		{tcp_error, Sock, Reason} ->
 3233: 		    ct:fail("socket error: ~p", [Reason]),
 3234: 		    (catch gen_tcp:close(ListenSocket)),
 3235: 		    exit(normal)
 3236: 	    after 10000 ->
 3237: 		    %% Just in case
 3238: 		    (catch gen_tcp:close(Sock)),
 3239: 		    (catch gen_tcp:close(ListenSocket)),
 3240: 		    exit(timeout)
 3241: 	    end;
 3242: 	Error ->
 3243: 	    exit(Error)
 3244:     end.
 3245: 
 3246: send_multipart_chunks(Socket) ->
 3247:     send(Socket, http_chunk:encode("--chunk_boundary\r\n")),
 3248:     send(Socket, http_chunk:encode("Content-Type: text/plain\r\nContent-Length: 4\r\n\r\n")),
 3249:     send(Socket, http_chunk:encode("test\r\n")),
 3250:     ct:sleep(500),
 3251:     send_multipart_chunks(Socket).
 3252: 
 3253: receive_stream_n(_, 0) ->
 3254:     ok;
 3255: receive_stream_n(Ref, N) ->
 3256:     receive
 3257: 	{http, {Ref, stream_start, _}} ->
 3258: 	    receive_stream_n(Ref, N);
 3259: 	{http, {Ref,stream, Data}} ->
 3260: 	    ct:log("Data:  ~p", [Data]),
 3261: 	    receive_stream_n(Ref, N-1)
 3262:     end.
 3263: 
 3264: is_ipv6_supported() ->
 3265:     {ok, Hostname0} = inet:gethostname(),
 3266:     try 
 3267:         lists:member(list_to_atom(Hostname0), ct:get_config(ipv6_hosts))
 3268:     catch
 3269:          _: _ ->
 3270:             false
 3271:     end.
